name: Stickman Ski
description:
Take your skis and hammer down the most beautiful and dangerous mountains in the world! Perform insane jumps and stunts, rush down the hills at full speed and handle various obstacles like avalanches, icy tracks, rocks, ski jumps, steep slopes, snow cannons and moving platforms.


FEATURES:
Beautiful designed slopes with increasing difficulty
Night races
Ghost support, compare with your previous ride
Spectacular jumps and crashes
Bone breaking avalanches
Insane obstacles like ski jumps, ice tracks, rocks, snow cannons and seesaws

And many more…

 Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!
